entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 18 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14 except minus 18 inland. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023
